The Development Trend of Web Development

With the development of Internet technology, Web development has become one of the core areas of the IT industry. From static web pages to dynamic interactions, from PC terminals to mobile terminals, the boundaries of Web development are constantly expanding.

As an important part of Web development, front-end development requires mastering core technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, while focusing on cutting-edge directions such as responsive design and performance optimization.

initial_html:
Application Scenarios of Float Layout

Float layout is a commonly used layout method in early Web development, mainly used to achieve effects such as text wrapping around images and multi-column layouts. Although Flexbox and Grid layouts are more powerful now, floats are still used in certain scenarios.

When using floats, it is necessary to clear floats to avoid parent container height collapse. Common methods include overflow: hidden, clear: both, and pseudo-element clearing.

Core Principles of Responsive Design

Responsive Web Design (RWD) is a design and development method that allows websites to automatically adjust layout and content according to the user's device screen size. Its core principles include: fluid layouts, flexible images, and media queries.
